property.name: dremio.azure.account
property.description: The name of the storage account.

property.name: dremio.azure.key
property.description: The shared access key for the storage account.

property.name: dremio.azure.mode
property.description: The storage account type. Value: STORAGE_V2

property.name: dremio.azure.secure
property.description: Boolean option to enable SSL connections. Value: True/False
